Keywords: Avengers , Robot , Young Avengers
Real Name: Jonas
Special Powers
HOLOGRAPHIC MANIPULATION: Once per game, POWER: Generate up to two Avengers Forever #024 Vision on click #9. // If Vision started the game on click #9, it can't generate characters and has a 0 point value for all effects (including scoring). Protected: Pulse Wave.

December 8, 2022
nelson2208
Image of this sculpt is way better than reality; his legs are almost twice length of his torso! It's like his legs got stuck while phasing through something and stretched them out!!
November 1, 2022
Oathful
"quote=DarkTortoise23: After playing him, I think this vision serves a limited but much needed niche on young avengers teams." // You bring up some good points, he is one of the two modern characters that has a damage modifying power top-dial for Young Avengers, and one of the three in silver age. Still, I wish his middle close combat clicks were more consistent to land on, but looking at him as a support piece instead of a secondary attacker does change my perspective on the piece.
October 31, 2022
DarkTortoise23
After playing him, I think this vision serves a limited but much needed niche on young avengers teams. Right now, the biggest weakness of even the key word's best figures is damage; even on your primary hitters in modern, you're getting three damage, maybe four, and with the exception of SR Hulkling, Hawkeye and Iron lad it isnt gonna be penetrating. Vision standing next to a ranged piece lets them hit a little harder and get that excellent 4 damage, and then when the enemies close in you generate two visions that boost melee damage and put them behind your close combat monster. In the meantime, he's a no-breakaway taxi that can get your ranged pieces out f tough situations. Definitely not the strongest of the set's young avenger lineup, but he definitely has his value.
October 24, 2022
Oathful
I'm not much for this Vision. If you had switched clicks 2 and 5 on his main dial I'd like it a bit more. Regardless, as he is now his traited versions of himself don't synergize with him very well unless you luck out on staying in the middle of his short dial. He makes a decent support piece for the limited roster of modern/silver age Young Avengers, but you can still do better in that regard. // Thematic: 5.5/10, Viability: 5/10, Fun Factor: 6.5/10, leans towards not fun.
